text: hello everyone today I'm going to give

Hub integrates with AWS control tower

security Hub detective controls with AWS

controls and manage them together using
AWS control tower
the control objectives in AWS control
tower Library are mapped to AWS security
Hub controls this gives you as a
customer a holistic view of specific
control objective
after you enable security hub from AWS
control tower a new service managed
standard will be created in security Hub
which contains more than 170 best
practice detective controls
by matching those with AWS control
Towers proactive controls you can get
robust protection both during and after
resource creation
I also want to add that proactive
controls can help you maintain
compliance because they flag actions
that may lead to policy violations or
misconfigurations
let us now navigate to the AWS control
tower service to see these features
